# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="7b400-102">Imprima e-mail, calendare, şi attachments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b400-103">Pentru a imprima un mesaj de e-mail:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-104">Selectaţi mesajul pe care doriţi să imprimaţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-105">La colţul din dreapta sus a mesajului, selectaţi trei puncte şi apoi selectaţi **printaţi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b400-106">Pentru a imprima calendarul:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-107">La colţul din dreapta sus a paginii, selectaţi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="7b400-108">**Print**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-109">Alege gama de vedere şi timp, şi selectaţi **printaţi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b400-110">Pentru a imprima o ataşare:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-111">Deschideţi mesajul care conţine ataşarea pe care doriţi să imprimaţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-112">Deplasaţi cursorul peste ataşare şi selectaţi pictograma **Download**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="7b400-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="7b400-114">După ce a descărcat fişierul, deschideţi-l cu program adecvat şi alegeţi opţiunea de a imprima.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="7b400-115">De exemplu, deschideţi un fişier .doc în Word şi apoi să imprimaţi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="7b400-116">Pentru a afla mai multe, consultaţi [mesajele de e-mail de imprimare, ataşamente, şi calendarelor din Outlook pe web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="7b400-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
